desc: FitNow Tracker is an affordable fitness tracker with premium functions including heart rate, blood pressure and blood oxygen monitoring, step counter, distance travelled, calories counter, sleep tracker, SMS/incoming call notifications and more. Get yours today for 50% off for a limited time only.

layout.text: Meet the Fitness Tracker That Can Help You Change Your Life.
Loaded with Premium Functions… But For a Fraction of the Price!
Helps You Pay Attention to Important Health Markers like Heart Rate and Blood Pressure
Holds You Accountable Like Having a Personal Trainer on Your Wrist
Motivates You Daily As You Track Your Progress Towards Goals
Works iPhone & Android Phones with Simple Setup
